page.title: 16HOME LIFE
page.content: {HOME LIFE} Normal two parent families predominate. Single parent families are on the increase. Quite a few parents work at power stations, Farms, Rampton Hospital. Working fathers normal, working mothers increasing to 50%. Homes are well equiped with electric cookers, microwave cookers (in 25% of homes), refrigerators, freezers, and food processers. Convience food preferred by children. Eating out (evenings) normal for 25%. Most homes have a pet, mostly dogs children get out of bed from 7.00am to noon on Saturdays, and go to bed from 10pm to midnight. Many have hobbies, but prefer to "play out" when not at school. Riding BMX Bikes, Football, Roller Skating, Swimming or at a club: 50% rather watch TV 30% like shopping.
